title: #274 - The Back to School Starter Pack
itunes:title: #274 - The Back to School Starter Pack
description:
Remember back in episode 200 where we did the Lazy Genius starter pack and listed 20 of the best episodes that will impact your life right away? This is that but for going back to school. If you don’t have kids or aren’t in education, you might not be super into this episode, but there might be a few helpful things in the realm of seasonal transitions so there you go. Let’s do this.

  • Episode #200: The Lazy Genius Starter Kit

  • Episode #246: 5 Essential Mindsets for Time Management

  • Episode #124: The Lazy Genius Weekly Plan
  • Episode #173: What is Your List-Making Personality?
  • Episode #121: How to Build a Fall Dinner Queue
  • Episode #174: Try a Meal Formula this Fall
  • Episode #54: The Lazy Genius Makes Soup
  • The Lazy Genius Kitchen
